archimate:Goal.name: CIS Controls v8
archimate:Goal.documentation:
The Center for Internet Security Controls are a set of action items for cyber defense that provide specific and actionable ways to thwart the most pervasive attacks. Version 8 is the latest iteration, focusing on modern systems and IT environments.
Center for Internet Security is a non-profit entity that provides cybersecurity tools and resources to help organizations improve their cybersecurity posture.
